FuncDef: This command enables the use of the Topology-Independent LFA algorithm in the LFA SPF calculation for this ISIS instance.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the maximum number of labels that the TI-LFA backup next-hop can use. The TI-LFA algorithm uses this value to limit the search for the Q node from the P node on the post-convergence path. Values-0 to 3. ParamDefault: Default- 2
